definition: good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect

sentences.english: But its biggest achievement by far is the sense of responsibility bestowed upon players.
sentences.chinese: 本作最大的特點就是玩家決定主人公的善惡命運。

sentences.english: He knows good from evil, fight from wrong.
sentences.chinese: 他能識別善惡，辨別是非。

sentences.english: Don't eat of the tree of the knowledge of good and evil.
sentences.chinese: 不要喫分辨善惡的知識樹的果實。

sentences.english: The line between good and evil is beginning to blur.
sentences.chinese: 善惡間的分界線已經變得模糊了。

sentences.english: We live in a world of black and white morality: this is something we all know.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知，我們生活在一個是非善惡黑白分明的世界。

sentences.english: And God knows that, that human beings will become like God knowing good and evil.
sentences.chinese: 上帝知道這點，人類就會像上帝一樣能分辨善惡。

sentences.english: Books tell us what is good and what is evil.
When looked at closely, all children's stories communicate simple views on good and evil.
sentences.chinese: 細細考量，童話故事傳遞的是最樸素的善惡觀。

sentences.english: Why do you think you can distinguish between good and evil?
sentences.chinese: 貞德，你憑什麼就認爲你有能力分辨善惡呢？

sentences.english: In Frankenstein and Typee, the conflicts between good and evil are ambiguous ones.
sentences.chinese: 善惡在《科學怪人》和《泰比》中的衝突十分模糊。

sentences.english: I'd never have expected him to behave like that；he's a real Jekyll and Hyde.
sentences.chinese: 我從來沒有想到他會那樣，他真是有善惡雙重人格。

sentences.english: Split personality refers to the dual characters of good and evil.
sentences.chinese: “分裂人格”指人格的善惡二重性。

sentences.english: Schopenhauer's tragedy theory did not differentiate the evil and the good.
sentences.chinese: 叔本華的悲劇理論是沒有善惡分別的。

sentences.english: Michael Shermer, in The Science of Good and Evil, calls it a debate stopper .
sentences.chinese: 在《善惡的科學》中，將此稱爲辯論制止者。

sentences.english: This is a Long Shu Jushi teach us good and evil external position, the corresponding method.
sentences.chinese: 這是龍舒居士教導我們對外在處境善惡，對應的方法。

sentences.english: My darling, what can be virtuous or sinful about buying a chicken ?
sentences.chinese: 我親愛的，買只雞的事還能談得上什麼善惡麼？

definition: noble and lowly/high versus low social hierarchy of ruler to people, father to son, husband to wife in Confucianism
variable/changeable/fickle/impermanence (Sanskrit: anitya)/ghost taking away the soul after death/to pass away/to die
severity (of the case)/degree of seriousness/whether sth is slight or serious
to reincarnate/reincarnation (Buddhism)/(of the seasons etc) to follow each other cyclically/cycle/CL:個|个[ge4]
four types of human emotions, namely: happiness 歡喜|欢喜[huan1 xi3], anger 憤怒|愤怒[fen4 nu4], sorrow 悲哀[bei1 ai1] and joy 快樂|快乐[kuai4 le4]
actual situation/the ultimate essence of things (Buddhism)
